entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
